title: SRE at InfluxData
bio: I am a Software Engineer that started my career in Turin as PHP developer. I moved in Dublin to make a new international experience and I almost worked as Build Engineer and DevOps. I recently join the InfluxData team as Site Reliability Engineer, I am taking care of our SaaS platform. Other than that I love open source and I am a Docker Captain and CNCF Ambassador. I am also making my first experience as grower of vegetables!
